item.description:
On Wednesday, November 14th from 6:00-8:00 p.m., join us at Scoozzi for a Fall wine show to benefit Habitat for Humanity. This event is sponsored by the Wine Thief and Scoozi


Enjoy sampling wines and light hors d'oeurvre at this casual walk-around


event.




Guests will receive special savings from The Wine Thief and Scoozzi will


extend a 15% discount to attendees dining following the event.




Habitat for Humanity offers a hand up rather than a handout to low income


families who qualify for the home buyers program. Approved Habitat families


work side by side with volunteers from the community to build their house.


The New Haven affiliate makes decisions locally, raises funds locally and


builds locally with families in need from the New Haven area. This event


will help fund the Amity Cares theme build, a group within the Greater New


Haven Habitat affiliate. It represents the Woodbridge, Bethany, Orange and


Westville areas.




The price per person is $45, inclusive of tax and gratuity. Prepaid


reservations can be secured by calling the Habitat for Humanity office at


203-785-0794.

If you are interested in this event, You must call and make reservations on your own. We will meet outside the restaurant prior to the event.


Cheers!

Lynn
